body:
Adds minor version 1.8.2 and adds the idea raised in the previous review:
Check access permission to docker using 'docker version'. Also:
- When creating the docker image in the fixture, it failed.
  Fixed it by creating the docker image before launch.
- Skip the somehow failing mansyntax testcase which only tests manuals.
title: libssh2: add 1.8.2 and fix passing the testsuite
